item.description:
Hello Ladies!!
Let’s enjoy a great Indian meal together in Jackson Heights Queens, home to some great authentic Indian food in Queens. And it’s All You Can Eat for less than $10 bucks!!

Please meet me on the corner of 74th Street and 37th Rd in front of the Citibank in Jacson Heights at 1pm.

Directions:
Take the R, V, or E trains to Jackson Heights, and exit from the back of the train if you are going Queens bound. If you are coming from the opposite direction (Manhattan bound) exit from the front.

Let me know if you ladies like this choice of venue...
Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I will email you with my number!
item.name: Indian Buffet in Jackson Heights!!!
